doc:
John Pleshette https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/John_Pleshette 0 John Pleshette (born July 27, 1942) is an American actor and screenwriter, best known for his role as Richard Avery on the television drama Knots Landing, and for portraying Lee Harvey Oswald in the TV movie The Trial of Lee Harvey Oswald. Pleshette also wrote several scripts for Knots Landing in the 1980s. John_Pleshette ( born July_27_,_1942 ) is an_American_actor_and_screenwriter , best_known for his_role as Richard_Avery on the_television_drama_Knots_Landing , and for portraying Lee_Harvey_Oswald in the_TV_movie The_Trial of Lee_Harvey_Oswald . Pleshette also wrote several_scripts for Knots_Landing in the_1980s .
